title: Create Contact List for Power BI Reports and Dashboards
excerpt: In this video, we will talk about the new rolled out feature by Microsoft which is the Contact List for the Power BI report and dashboards.   In this video, we will learn what is the real use of the Contact lists and then we will create a Contact List for the Power BI reports and dashboards.   Contact
